mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_a_request_repair VALUES( tl_a_request_repair_seq.nextval, #{dorm_student_pk}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image_link}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TL_A_REQUEST_REPAIR tarr WHERE DORM_STUDENT_PK = #{dorm_student_pk}
SELECT * FROM TL_A_REQUEST_REPAIR tarr ORDER BY REQUEST_DATE desc

SELECT tjsi.NAME AS NAME, tarr.TITLE AS TITLE, tarr.CONTENT AS CONTENT, TARR.REQUEST_REPAIR_PK AS REQUEST_PK, tarr.REQUEST_DATE AS REQUEST_DATE , TARR.DORM_STUDENT_PK AS DORM_STUDENT_PK, TARR.IMAGE_LINK AS IMG_LINK from TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO tjsi INNER JOIN TL_A_DORM_STUDENT tads ON tads.STUDENT_PK = TJSI.STUDENT_PK INNER JOIN TL_A_REQUEST_REPAIR tarr ON tarr.DORM_STUDENT_PK = tads.DORM_STUDENT_PK WHERE tarr.DORM_STUDENT_PK = TADS.DORM_STUDENT_PK ORDER BY TARR.REQUEST_DATE desc
SELECT * FROM TL_A_REQUEST_REPAIR tarr WHERE REQUEST_REPAIR_PK = #{request_repair_pk}
SELECT * FROM TL_A_DORM_STUDENT tads WHERE DORM_STUDENT_PK = #{dorm_student_pk}
SELECT * FROM TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO tjsi WHERE STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TL_A_REQUEST_REPAIR tarr WHERE REQUEST_REPAIR_PK = #{request_repair_pk}
